qas.question: What platform was Kanye named  a co-owner of in 2015?
What longtime friend of Kanye acquired Tidal in 2015?
What criticisms of other streaming platforms does Tidal stand to challenge?
What music streaming service is Kanye West a co-owner of?

answers.text: lossless audio and high definition music videos

qas.question: What music service is a huge competitor for Tidal?

context: On March 30, 2015, it was announced that West is a co-owner, with various other music artists, in the music streaming service <a0_0><a3_0>Tidal<a3_0/><a0_0/>. The service specialises in <a4_0>lossless audio and high definition music videos<a4_0/>. <a5_0>Jay Z<a5_0/> acquired the parent company of Tidal, Aspiro, in the first quarter of 2015. Including Beyoncé and <a1_0>Jay-Z<a1_0/>, sixteen artist stakeholders (such as Rihanna, Beyoncé, Madonna, Chris Martin, Nicki Minaj and more) co-own Tidal, with the majority owning a 3% equity stake. The idea of having an all artist owned streaming service was created by those involved to adapt to the increased demand for streaming within the current music industry, and to rival other streaming services such as <a6_0>Spotify<a6_0/>, which have been criticised for their <a2_0>low payout of royalties<a2_0/>. "The challenge is to get everyone to respect music again, to recognize its value", stated Jay-Z on the release of Tidal.
